summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that validates the functionality of AWS Glue client wrappers and related utilities. It includes helpers for constructing mock Glue resources (databases, tables, partitions, crawlers, jobs, triggers, sessions, schemas, and versions) and a series of tests covering creation, retrieval, listing with pagination, tagging, deletion, job run management, partition filter generation, and error handling across the Glue Data Catalog and Schema Registry, all using Moto to simulate AWS services.
business_intent: Provide thorough automated verification of Glue integration code to ensure correct behavior, prevent regressions, and support continuous integration by simulating AWS Glue operations in a controlled test environment.
